Class AbstractAlignmentAction

java.lang.Object
  gate.alignment.gui.actions.impl.AbstractAlignmentAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
AlignmentAction
Direct Known Subclasses:
AlignAction, RemoveAlignmentAction, ResetAction
public abstract class AbstractAlignmentAction
extends Object
implements AlignmentAction

Abstract class that provides default implementation of some of the methods declared in the AlignmentAction interface.

cleanup

public void cleanup()
Description copied from interface: AlignmentAction
This method should free up the memory by releasing any resources occupied this method. It is called just before the alignment editor is closed.
